page.title: 01Hollington,Crowhurst Areas
page.content: Our area covers the N.W. part of Hastings and St.Leonards, the district known as{Hollington.}It extends to the West to part of the village of {Crowhurst}(6 miles from Hastings Centre). The Northern edge includes the A2100 'Ridge' road at the back of the town. It is a{mixed area;}from the busy {residential}Hollington region, with some industry, to the pretty village of Crowhurst. About two-thirds of our area is{farmland and woodland.}This is decreasing each year as more building takes place. Over the last 10 years many new roads, houses and factories have been built. So the region is rapidly changing, and still doing so. The A21 London road, and Hastings to LOndon railway line pass through the region. It is 2 miles to the sea and Hastings Town Centre.
